# vue-qrcode

A Vue component to generate [QR codes](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QR_code).

## Usage

```html
<qrcode val="https://github.com/"></qrcode>
```

## Available Props

prop      | type                 | default value
----------|----------------------|--------------
`val`   | `string`             |
`size`    | `number`             | `128`
`bg-color` | `string` (CSS color) | `"#FFFFFF"`
`fg-color` | `string` (CSS color) | `"#000000"`
